front.title: IKEv2 based lightweight secure data communication

abstract.t: This document describes an IKEv2 based lightweight secure data communication mechanism over UDP port 4500, that supports reliable and unreliable data transfers, integrity protected encryption and integrity-only protection, in-band and out-of-band keys, fragmentation and payload identification. With this mechanism, IKEv2 provides a complete secure connectivity solution that addresses key management and secure data communication needs of applications.
